(Circulated with reference to G.T. 7410.)The Chancellor of the Exchequer has now signified his willingness to accept decision III of the above paper (G.T. 7410) ; but intimates that he cannot see his way to agree t^ IV unless there is a Cabinet decision to that effect.(Signed) Thomas Jones, Acting Secretary, War Cabinet,2, Whitehall Gardens, S.V.1
